This team is responsible & accountable for implementing the Pathfinder Roadmap, a framework designed to guide organizations through cloud adoption and governance. item.description: The concept of a Cloud Center of Excellence (CCoE) is well-documented, and many organizations recognize its added value in driving innovation and operational efficiency. However, while there is a wealth of information on what a CCoE is, practical guidance on how to effectively implement one is often lacking, leaving organizations with more questions than answers. Even comprehensive resources like Microsoft’s Cloud Adoption Framework primarily focus on the functions of a CCoE in its end-state without delving into the intricacies of its establishment.
